# Test Tasks Agent

## Purpose
Provides a curated collection of software engineering tasks for testing multi-agent workflows.

## Key Features
- Exercises different agent capabilities (e.g., analysis, research, implementation).
- Fetches gold standards from:
  - GitHub repositories.
  - SWE-bench dataset.
  - Local cache.

## Usage
- Run a single task.
- Run all tasks.
- List available tasks.
- Fetch gold standards from source.
